title: Cixin Liu - The Three-Body Problem (Three Body #1)
description:
The Three-Body Problem is the first chance for English-speaking listeners to experience this multiple award-winning phenomenon from China's most beloved science fiction author, Liu Cixin.

With the scope of Dune and the commercial action of Independence Day, Three-Body Problem is the first chance for English-speaking readers to experience this multple-award-winning phenomenon from ChinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most beloved science fiction author, Liu Cixin.

Set against the backdrop of ChinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Cultural Revolution, a secret military project sends signals into space to establish contact with aliens. An alien civilization on the brink of destruction captures the signal and plans to invade Earth. Meanwhile, on Earth, different camps start forming, planning to either welcome the superior beings and help them take over a world seen as corrupt, or to fight against the invasion. The result is a science fiction masterpiece of enormous scope and vision.


Read by Luke Daniels
